index.name: Lenra
index.title: Create your cross-platform JavaScript / Python / C app.
index.description: Lenra is an open source framework to create your app using any language, and deploy it without any Ops scale, built on ethical values.

beta.name: Beta
beta.title: Beta version
beta.description: The Lenra platform is made to accelerate the creation of your applications and simplify their hosting while preserving the personal data of your users.
